properties.description: Query to combine tables into the Vitals dataset

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CLINICAL_EVENT_ID as double,
		ENCNTR_ID as double,
		PERSON_ID as double,
		UTC_TMP2_4 as timestamp,
		ENCNTR_FINANCIAL_ID as double,
		EVENT_ID as double,
		UTC_TMP2_7 as timestamp,
		EVENT_TITLE_TEXT as string,
		VIEW_LEVEL as double,
		ORDER_ID as double,
		CATALOG_CD as double,
		SERIES_REF_NBR as string,
		ACCESSION_NBR as string,
		CONTRIBUTOR_SYSTEM_CD as double,
		REFERENCE_NBR as string,
		PARENT_EVENT_ID as double,
		EVENT_RELTN_CD as double,
		UTC_TMP2_18 as timestamp,
		EVENT_CLASS_CD as double,
		EVENT_CD as double,
		EVENT_TAG as string,
		UTC_TMP2_22 as timestamp,
		EVENT_END_DT_TM_OS as double,
		RESULT_VAL as string,
		RESULT_UNITS_CD as double,
		RESULT_TIME_UNITS_CD as double,
		TASK_ASSAY_CD as double,
		RECORD_STATUS_CD as double,
		RESULT_STATUS_CD as double,
		AUTHENTIC_FLAG as double,
		PUBLISH_FLAG as double,
		QC_REVIEW_CD as double,
		NORMALCY_CD as double,
		NORMALCY_METHOD_CD as double,
		INQUIRE_SECURITY_CD as double,
		RESOURCE_GROUP_CD as double,
		RESOURCE_CD as double,
		SUBTABLE_BIT_MAP as double,
		COLLATING_SEQ as string,
		UTC_TMP2_40 as timestamp,
		VERIFIED_PRSNL_ID as double,
		UTC_TMP2_42 as timestamp,
		PERFORMED_PRSNL_ID as double,
		UTC_TMP2_44 as timestamp,
		UPDT_ID as double,
		UPDT_TASK as double,
		UPDT_CNT as double,
		UPDT_APPLCTX as double,
		NORMAL_LOW as string,
		NORMAL_HIGH as string,
		CRITICAL_LOW as string,
		CRITICAL_HIGH as string,
		UTC_TMP2_53 as timestamp,
		EVENT_TAG_SET_FLAG as double,
		NOTE_IMPORTANCE_BIT_MAP as double,
		UTC_TMP2_56 as timestamp,
		ORDER_ACTION_SEQUENCE as double,
		ENTRY_MODE_CD as double,
		SOURCE_CD as double,
		CLINICAL_SEQ as string,
		EVENT_END_TZ as double,
		EVENT_START_TZ as double,
		PERFORMED_TZ as double,
		VERIFIED_TZ as double,
		TASK_ASSAY_VERSION_NBR as double,
		MODIFIER_LONG_TEXT_ID as double,
		SRC_EVENT_ID as double,
		UTC_TMP2_68 as timestamp,
		CE_DYNAMIC_LABEL_ID as double,
		NOMEN_STRING_FLAG as double,
		LAST_UTC_TS as timestamp,
		DEVICE_FREE_TXT as string,
		TRAIT_BIT_MAP as double,
		TXN_ID_TEXT as string,
		CLU_SUBKEY1_FLAG as double,
		VALID_UNTIL_DT_TM as timestamp,
		VERIFIED_DT_TM as timestamp,
		VALID_FROM_DT_TM as timestamp,
		UPDT_DT_TM as timestamp,
		SRC_CLINSIG_UPDT_DT_TM as timestamp,
		PERFORMED_DT_TM as timestamp,
		EXPIRATION_DT_TM as timestamp,
		EVENT_START_DT_TM as timestamp,
		EVENT_END_DT_TM as timestamp,
		CLINSIG_UPDT_DT_TM as timestamp,
		INST_ID as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> clinicalevent
